verses.name: Revelation 14:3
verses.text: And they sung as it were a new song before the throne, and before the four beasts, and the elders: and no man could learn that song but the hundred and forty and four thousand, which were redeemed from the earth.

verses.name: Revelation 14:4
verses.text: These are they which were not defiled with women; for they are virgins. These are they which follow the Lamb whithersoever he goeth. These were redeemed from among men, being the firstfruits unto God and to the Lamb.

verses.name: Revelation 14:5
verses.text: And in their mouth was found no guile: for they are without fault before the throne of God.
